tasks.name: Backup Database
tasks.summary: Daily backup of the main database to ensure data safety.
tasks.description: This task performs a daily backup of the main database at 2 AM to ensure that all data is safely stored and can be restored in case of any data loss or corruption.

tasks.name: Generate Reports
tasks.description: This task generates sales reports every Monday to provide insights into the weekly sales performance and help in making informed business decisions.

tasks.name: System Update
tasks.description: This task updates the system software on the 1st of every month to ensure that the system is running the latest version with all the latest features and security patches.

tasks.name: Data Sync
tasks.summary: Hourly synchronization of data between servers.
tasks.description: This task synchronizes data between servers every hour to ensure that all servers have the latest data and are in sync with each other.

tasks.name: Security Scan
tasks.summary: Daily security scan to identify vulnerabilities.
tasks.description: This task performs a security scan every day at 3 AM to identify any vulnerabilities or security issues in the system and ensure that the system is secure.

tasks.name: Cleanup Logs
tasks.description: This task cleans up old logs every Sunday to free up disk space and ensure that only relevant logs are retained for future reference.

tasks.name: Deploy Application
tasks.summary: On-demand deployment of new application version.
tasks.description: This task deploys a new version of the application on demand to ensure that the latest features and updates are available to users.

workflows.name: Onboarding Workflow
workflows.summary: Automated workflow for onboarding new employees.
workflows.details: This workflow automates the process of onboarding new employees, including setting up accounts, providing access to necessary systems, and completing required documentation.

workflows.name: Offboarding Workflow
workflows.details: This workflow automates the process of offboarding employees, including revoking access to systems, collecting company assets, and completing exit documentation.

integrations.name: Salesforce Integration
integrations.summary: Integration with Salesforce CRM for seamless data exchange.
integrations.details: This integration connects the system with Salesforce CRM to enable seamless data exchange and ensure that customer data is always up-to-date.

integrations.name: Slack Integration
integrations.summary: Integration with Slack for real-time notifications.
integrations.details: This integration connects the system with Slack to enable real-time notifications and alerts for critical issues and updates.

notifications.name: Email Alerts
notifications.description: Send email alerts for critical issues
notifications.details: This notification sends email alerts for critical issues to ensure that relevant stakeholders are informed and can take necessary actions.

notifications.name: SMS Alerts
notifications.description: Send SMS alerts for high priority issues
notifications.summary: SMS alerts for high priority issues.
notifications.details: This notification sends SMS alerts for high priority issues to ensure that relevant stakeholders are informed and can take necessary actions.

reports.name: Monthly Sales Report
reports.details: This report provides a detailed analysis of the sales performance for the month, including key metrics and insights to help in making informed business decisions.

reports.name: Weekly Performance Report
reports.details: This report provides a detailed analysis of the performance metrics for the week, including key metrics and insights to help in making informed business decisions.
